page.title: 12LAW & ORDER
page.content: When local schoolchildren surveyed residents of Beaumont Leys they found that not many people felt safe walking the streets at night and wanted more police patrolling the area. There is one mobile police station staffed by 3 sergeants, 13 constables and 4 CID. Each constable has a beat of nearly a square km and the main mode of transport is by walking although Panda cars patrol at night.When called out , the police are usually on the spot within 10 minutes. The majority of crimes are to do with burglary, vandalism or domestic quarrels.
